duck: Application for employment, a form or collection of forms that an individual seeking employment must fill out when seeking employment
Application software, computer software designed to help the user to perform specific tasks
Function application in mathematics and computer science
application definition: an act of applying.
Patent application, a request pending at a patent office for the grant of a patent

wiki.text:
'Application' may refer to:

*A verbal or written request: **Application for employment, a form or collection
of forms that an individual seeking employment must fill out when seeking
employment ** Patent application, a request pending at a patent office for the
grant of a patent
* Application software, computer software designed to help the user to perform
  specific tasks
* Function application in mathematics and computer science
* Application (virtue), a characteristic encapsulated in diligence
wiki.title: application
